Putin offers political asylum to James Comey, citing potential prosecution in U.S.

Turkey's Erdoğan slams US move to issue warrants for bodyguards - Speaking at an iftar dinner in the capital Ankara on June 15, Erdoğan said: "They have issued arrest warrants for 12 of my bodyguards. What kind of law is this?"

Brexit: More than half of skilled EU workers in UK say they are going to leave
Australian prime minister impersonates Donald Trump in leaked audio
